trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects for an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"> </xref> ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This collection is a dictionary containing all the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding> objects on an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是字典，其中包含所有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>上的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can access the objects contained in this collection through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取透過此集合中包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding> or DataBindingCollection objects associated with a server control exist only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>或只能在設計階段的伺服器控制項相關聯的 DataBindingCollection 物件存在。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time.
trans-unit.target: 它們在執行階段不存在而且，因此，無法存取在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的資料繫結物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件變更。

trans-unit.source: The changed event occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Add%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Clear%2A> method, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的事件發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Add%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Clear%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Remove%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件從<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the data-binding collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷資料繫結集合是否包含特定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> contains an element with the specified name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>包含具有指定的項目名稱; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, beginning at the <xref:System.Array> object's specified index.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>值以一維<xref:System.Array>開始在<xref:System.Array>的指定索引的物件。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製值的目的地<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index in the array, specified by the `array` parameter, where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中所指定之陣列的索引`array`參數，開始複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that contains the collection's members.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，其中包含集合的成員。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合是唯讀的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合已同步處理 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object with the specified property name.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件與指定的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要找的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> with the specified property name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"> </xref>與指定的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: If no object with the specified name exists, this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有指定名稱的物件不存在，這個值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object associated with the specified property name from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>從指定的屬性名稱與相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合並將它加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>

trans-unit.source: The property name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的屬性名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>物件從<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合並將它加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"> </xref>從移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object, associated with the specified property name, from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and controls whether to add the binding to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> list.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>從指定的屬性名稱，與相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合，並控制是否要加入的繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>清單。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>

trans-unit.source: The property associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether to add the property name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> list. <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicates that the `propertyName` parameter will be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> property, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> indicates that `propertyName` will not be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*> property.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否要加入的屬性名稱<> *> 清單。<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>表示`propertyName`參數將會加入至<> *> 屬性，以及<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示`propertyName`將不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>從集合移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 名稱陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>從集合移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>用來對集合進行同步存取。</xref:System.Object>
